mapper.insert: insert into core_data.users_roles (id, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, role_id, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update core_data.users_roles set created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, role_id, user_id from core_data.users_roles where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
